description: Dashboard visualizes OpenShift Pipelines performance metrics including PipelineRuns, TaskRuns, controller performance, and cluster resource usage

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start) AS "time",
    (label_values->>'__results_PipelineRuns_count_succeeded')::DOUBLE PRECISION AS "value",
    '__results_PipelineRuns_count_succeeded concurrency 12' as "metric"
FROM
    data
WHERE
    horreum_testid = 391
    AND (label_values->>'__parameters_test_concurrent')::DOUBLE PRECISION = 12
ORDER BY
    start;

SELECT
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start) AS "time",
    (label_values->>'__results_PipelineRuns_count_succeeded')::DOUBLE PRECISION AS "value",
    '__results_PipelineRuns_count_succeeded concurrency 14' as "metric"
FROM
    data
WHERE
    horreum_testid = 391
    AND (label_values->>'__parameters_test_concurrent')::DOUBLE PRECISION = 14
ORDER BY
    start;

FROM
    data
WHERE

    AND (label_values->>'__parameters_test_concurrent')::DOUBLE PRECISION = 16
ORDER BY
    start;

ORDER BY
    start;

SELECT
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start) AS "time",
    (label_values->>'__results_PipelineRuns_duration_avg')::DOUBLE PRECISION AS "value",
    '__results_PipelineRuns_duration_avg concurrency 20' as "metric"
FROM
    data
WHERE
    horreum_testid = 391
    AND (label_values->>'__parameters_test_concurrent')::DOUBLE PRECISION = 20
ORDER BY
    start;

WITH daily_agg AS (
  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('day', start) AS day,
    (label_values->>'__parameters_test_concurrent')::INTEGER AS concurrency,
    AVG((label_values->>'__results_PipelineRuns_Success_pending_avg')::DOUBLE PRECISION) AS pending,
    AVG((label_values->>'__results_PipelineRuns_Success_running_avg')::DOUBLE PRECISION) AS running
  FROM data
  WHERE horreum_testid = 391
    AND $__timeFilter(start)
    AND label_values ? '__parameters_test_concurrent'
    AND label_values ? '__results_PipelineRuns_Success_pending_avg'
    AND label_values ? '__results_PipelineRuns_Success_running_avg'
  GROUP BY day, concurrency
)

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM day) AS time,
  'pending @ ' || concurrency AS metric,
  pending AS value
FROM daily_agg


UNION ALL

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM day) AS time,
  'running @ ' || concurrency AS metric,
  running AS value
FROM daily_agg


ORDER BY time, metric;

WITH daily_agg AS (
  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('day', start) AS day,
    (label_values->>'__parameters_test_concurrent')::INTEGER AS concurrency,
    AVG((label_values->>'__results_TaskRunsToPods_creationTimestampDiff_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION) AS PodCreationTimeStamp
  FROM data
  WHERE horreum_testid = 391
    AND $__timeFilter(start)
    AND label_values ? '__parameters_test_concurrent'
    AND label_values ? '__results_TaskRunsToPods_creationTimestampDiff_mean'
  GROUP BY day, concurrency
)

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM day) AS time,
  'PodCreationTimeStamp @ ' || concurrency AS metric,
  PodCreationTimeStamp AS value
FROM daily_agg


ORDER BY time, metric;

WITH daily_agg AS (
  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('day', start) AS day,
    (label_values->>'__parameters_test_concurrent')::INTEGER AS concurrency,
    AVG((label_values->>'__measurements_tektonPipelinesController_cpu_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION) AS pipeline_controller_cpu,
    AVG((label_values->>'__measurements_tektonOperatorProxyWebhook_cpu_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION) AS pipeline_proxy_webhook_cpu,
    AVG((label_values->>'__measurements_tektonPipelinesWebhook_cpu_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION) AS pipeline_webhook_cpu
  FROM data
  WHERE horreum_testid = 391
    AND $__timeFilter(start)
    AND label_values ? '__parameters_test_concurrent'
    AND label_values ? '__measurements_tektonPipelinesController_cpu_mean'
    AND label_values ? '__measurements_tektonOperatorProxyWebhook_cpu_mean'
    AND label_values ? '__measurements_tektonPipelinesWebhook_cpu_mean'
  GROUP BY day, concurrency
)

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM day) AS time,

FROM daily_agg


UNION ALL

  FROM data
  WHERE horreum_testid = 391
    AND $__timeFilter(start)

    AVG((label_values->>'__measurements_kubeApiserver_cpu_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION) / 1073741824 AS kube_api_server_cpu

  FROM data
  WHERE horreum_testid = 391
    AND $__timeFilter(start)
    AND label_values ? '__parameters_test_concurrent'
    AND label_values ? '__measurements_apiserver_memory_mean'
    AND label_values ? '__measurements_kubeApiserver_memory_mean'
  GROUP BY day, concurrency

SELECT

FROM daily_agg


UNION ALL

  'kube_api_server_mem @ ' || concurrency AS metric,
  kube_api_server_mem AS value
FROM daily_agg


ORDER BY time, metric;
